name: Brownman Revival
description: '''Brownman Revival''' is a Filipino [[reggae]] band founded in November 1994. They count [[Bob Marley]], [[Big Mountain (band)|Big Mountain]], [[Aswad (band)|Aswad]], [[Inner Circle (band)|Inner Circle]], and [[UB40]] among their musical influences as well as Filipino reggae group [[Tropical Depression (band)|Tropical Depression]] and OPM acts such as [[Eraserheads]], [[APO Hiking Society]], and [[VST & Company]].  One author describes Brownman Revival's music as "reggae-inspired beats with traditional folk pop rhythms and the basest of lyrical themes".
